title: Authorizes village of Harriman to adopt local laws exempting such village from any regulations that restrict the burning of garbage in open fires in certain circumstances
summary: Authorizes village of Harriman to adopt local laws exempting such village from any regulations that restrict the burning of garbage in open fires in certain circumstances.
actClause: AN ACT authorizing the village of Harriman to adopt local laws exempting such village from any regulations that restrict the burning of garbage in open fires in certain circumstances
